tech.name: Hylar V Assault Laser
tech.effect: Each of your cruisers and destroyers receives +1 on all combat rolls.

tech.name: Ion Cannons
tech.effect: Each of your dreadnoughts receives +2 on all combat rolls.

tech.name: ADT
tech.effect: Each of your destroyers receives +1 on anti-fighter barrage, further increased by one for every fifth enemy fighter.

tech.name: Hyper Metabolism
tech.effect: All tier i personnel are unlocked.

tech.name: Magen Defence Grid
tech.effect: You may not build spaceborne artillery systems. Your dreadnoughts have a spaceborne artillery system capacity of one.

tech.name: Auxiliary Drones
tech.effect: Your fleets that contain at least one dreadnought roll an additional combat die at 9+. This die benefits from all modifiers to dreadnought combat dice.

tech.name: Assault Cannon
tech.effect: Up to two of your cruisers may take one pre-combat shot each at +1.

tech.name: Deep Space Cannon
tech.effect: During your turns, dreadnoughts in adjacent systems may immediately take two shots. These hits will cause double casualties against fighters.

tech.name: Antimass Deflectors
tech.effect: Your ships may move through asteroid field and ion storm systems. Your ships suffer no movement penalty when leaving nebulae.

tech.name: Striker Fleets
tech.effect: Your destroyers may now move through nebulae. When moving through a hazard, destroyers receive +1 on all combat rolls.

tech.name: XRD Transporters
tech.effect: Your carriers and dreadnoughts receive +1 movement.

tech.name: Fighter Bays
tech.effect: Your dreadnoughts now have a fighter capacity of three.

tech.name: Type IV Drive
tech.effect: Your cruisers and flagships now receive +1 movement.

tech.name: Advanced Fighters
tech.effect: Your fighters may now move independently with a movement rate of two and receive +1 on all combat rolls.

tech.name: Fleet Logistics
tech.effect: Once per round, you may flip one of your command counters on the board. Your ships may leave that system, but you may not activate it again for the remainder of the round.

tech.name: Wave Deflectors
tech.effect: Your ships may now pass through systems containing enemy fleets and continue their movement to the activated system.

tech.name: Stasis Capsules
tech.effect: Your cruisers and dreadnoughts may now carry one ground force unit each.

tech.name: Hydroponics
tech.effect: Your fleet supply is increased by one in all systems that don't contain any of your capital ships.

tech.name: Cybernetics
tech.effect: Each of your fighters receives +1 on all combat rolls.

tech.name: Biomechanical Circuits
tech.effect: Your command pool is permanently increased by one.

tech.name: Xeno Psychology
tech.effect: Receive two additional votes for each unique personnel you have.

tech.name: Neural Computing
tech.effect: Once per development phase, you may spend six resources to research a random technology advance (for which you have the necessary prerequisites).

tech.name: Biosphere Influence
tech.effect: Each of your planets without a space dock has a production capacity equal to its resource value and a fighter capacity equal to its influence value.

tech.name: Organ Printing
tech.effect: Each of your dreadnoughts has a production capacity of one.

tech.name: Enviro Compensator
tech.effect: The production capacity of your space docks is increased by one.

tech.name: Transfabrication
tech.effect: Upon losing a dreadnought, immediately replace it with a destroyer. At the end of combat, if at least one such destroyer remains, you may replace one of them with a damaged dreadnought.

tech.name: Sarween Tools
tech.effect: Whenever you produce units at any space dock, you now receive one additional resource with which to build units.

tech.name: Duranium Armor
tech.effect: After taking casualties, you may repair one damaged ship.

tech.name: War Sun
tech.effect: You may now produce war suns. War suns receive one bonus movement if they do not end their turn in a system containing enemy ships.

tech.name: Arkan Iridium
tech.effect: The cost of your space docks is reduced by two. You may build at your space docks immediately after construction.

tech.name: Space Gates
tech.effect: When leaving or moving through a system containing a friendly space dock towards a destination without enemy ships, friendly ships receive three bonus movement.

tech.name: Integrated Economy
tech.effect: When building ships at a space dock, you may place the newly constructed units in friendly or empty adjacent systems.
